title: Where the profits lie
creator_credit: British Information Services, Geoff Busby and John Wiles
brief_description: Shows profitable egg production, high-lighting the new ideas of economic poultry nutrition and how research has developed a low stress diet, which enables hens to produce more eggs with reduced mortality rate and at a lower cost.
creator_credit_for_label: British Information Services, Geoff Busby and John Wiles
